enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: On the chip modulator clock will be used

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: One conversion following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous conversions following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass mode where ADC and PGA of channel0 are disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: On the chip modulator clock will be used

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: One conversion following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous conversions following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass mode where ADC and PGA of channel1 are disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: On the chip modulator clock will be used

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: One conversion following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous conversions following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass mode where ADC and PGA of channel2 are disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: On the chip modulator clock will be used

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: One conversion following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous conversions following a triggering event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass mode where ADC and PGA of channel3 are disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Left justified 2's complement 32-bit : SVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV00000000 where (S= sign bit , V=valid result value, 0=zero)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Right justified 2's complement 32-bit : SSSSSSSSSVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVV where (S= sign bit , V= valid result value, 0= zero)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: All ADCs, PGAs and Decimation filters are disabled. Clock Configuration bits will be reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: .= All ADCs, PGAs and Decimation filters are enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AFE will be in normal mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: AFE will be in low power mode. Setting this bit reduce the current consumption of ADC and Buffer Amplifier , the max modulator clock frequency is below 1Mhz

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: All ADCs and filters will get simultaneously enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel3 is disabled or has not completed its start up period

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel3 is ready to initiate conversions

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel2 is disabled or has not completed its start up period

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel2 is ready to initiate conversions

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel1 is disabled or has not completed its start up period

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel1 is ready to initiate conversions

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel0 is disabled or has not completed its start up period

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: AFE Channel0 is ready to initiate conversions
